issue.title: [C++] Streamline namespace array::test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3059](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3059). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we have some test helpers that live in the `arrow::test` namespace, some in `arrow` (or topic subnamespaces such as `arrow::io`). I see no reason for the discrepancy.

I propose the simple solution of removing the `arrow::test` namespace altogether. If not desirable, then we should make sure we put all helpers in that namespace.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3059?focusedCommentId=16581396) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I think it's fine to eliminate. It has occasionally been a nuisance when writing unit tests
